Miscellaneous Highlights: Malawi will host three Fifa World Cup qualifying matches scheduled for Lilongwe within six days from this Thursday, June 6, 2024.
The hosts, the Flames, welcome Sao Tome in a Group H duel on Thursday at Bingu National Stadium
Others: Kenya are unable to play the World Cup qualifiers at home as their stadiums are undergoing major renovations as they prepare to host the 2027 Africa Cup of Nations finals.
